attributes.action: call a general election as soon as reasonably practicable, and in any case before the end of October 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear that the 'Expenses scandal' has shaken public confidence in politicians in general and certain MPs in particular.  It is also clear that the public demand a say in how Westminster will be run from now on.  I note that 394 attempts to start a petition on this subject have been rejected.  Please listen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
